GET /api/devStatus.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints and their development status

GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: returns a single review object specified by the parametric review_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: an array of comments for the given review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: responds with the posted comment for a particular review_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id
